comments.body: I was able to find everything above `// buttons`, but could you point out where this and the below properties are used int the original source?

The comments indicate the file name pnotify.`<comment>`.js.
Here's an example for buttons: https://github.com/sciactive/pnotify/blob/master/src/pnotify.buttons.js#L171

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +269,273 @@    error_icon?: string,
    // buttons
    closer?: string,
    pin_down?: string,
    pin_up?: string,
